LanguageData.BiotechPatch_DeathrestAutoWake: Automatically enable auto-wake for deathresting pawns
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_MechsOutsideRadius: Allow moving mechs outside the mechanitor control radius
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_HemogenExtractionSpam: Disable message when extracting hemogen from hostile faction
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_ChildLaborEncouraged: Child labor: encouraged requires scheduled work
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_AllowForbiddenXenogermImpla: Allow xenogerm implantation via health tab for xenogerms that are forbidden
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_DrugDeficiencyAlert: Show alert for drug deficiency due to genes
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_LoadGrowthVats: Change text "growing" growth vats to "loading" growth vats
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_AutoChildNicknamesDisabled: Disable auto-nicknaming of children at growth moments
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_ChildrenGoByFirstName: Children are called by their first name by default
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_XenogermCreationForced: Prioritizing creating a xenogerm won't be interrupted at the worker's whimsy
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_GeneTraitsDontCancelIdentic: Bug fix: Same xenogene/endogene can both cancel each other out
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_GrowthMomentChoiceColors: Show colored trait/passion choices for growth moments based on utility
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_GrowthMomentTraitSuppressio: Bug fix: Traits selected at growth moment are unsuppressed by genes that should suppress them
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_ExostriderLostAllowsComplex: Bug fix: Abandoning the exostrider remains prevents mechanitor complex quest
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_CustomHybridXenotypes: Bug fix: Children of a custom xenotype and another custom xenotype or baseliner are labeled as baseliner
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_BreastfeedingCanBeInterrupt: Breastfeeding can be interrupted if the lactator has more important things to do
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_BirthNotCancelledWhenNotDow: Bug fix: If a pawn giving birth is downed and then undowned during labor, the ritual is cancelled
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_BreastfeedAfterBirth: Doctor gives baby to parent to breastfeed after birth
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_MoveBabyToSaferTempLater: Only move baby to safer temperature when it has temperature injury
LanguageData.BiotechPatch_DrugDeficiencyAlertDesc: People are deficient in their life-sustaining drugs:\n{0}
